screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .pyon file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
screenshot.caption: PYON file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code

description: Like .JSON files, PYON files are used to structure and store datasets that programs can retrieve and update. Unlike JSON files, PYON files are meant to be used only with Python programs that import the PYON Reader (pyonr) package.
The document-oriented database NotDB, which is also developed by nawafalqri, also uses PYON-format data.
